statements: SELECT * FROM chat_messages;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, message_date FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT message_text, message_date FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY message_date DESC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) as message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = receiver_id AND message_text LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT message_id, message_text, message_date FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678' ORDER BY message_date DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE message_date > '2022-01-01' AND message_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, MAX(message_date) AS latest_message_date FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id ORDER BY latest_message_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 123;
SELECT message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 456;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice' AND player_email = 'alice@example.com';
SELECT player_id, last_login FROM players WHERE registration_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 AND sender_id != 1;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id HAVING message_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' OR player_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1
SELECT message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2
SELECT player_id, username FROM players WHERE level > 5
SELECT * FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT player_id, MAX(level) FROM players GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM players WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_id, username FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.player_id = game_sessions.player_id WHERE level >= 5 ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT message_id, message_text, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 OR receiver_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, username, level, start_time, end_time FROM players JOIN game_sessions ON players.player_id = game_sessions.player_id WHERE level < 10 ORDER BY end_time DESC

SELECT session_id, username, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions JOIN players ON game_sessions.player_id = players.player_id WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY session_id ASC
SELECT * FROM chat_messages;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT guild_name, guild_leader_id FROM guilds WHERE guild_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE player_level > 50 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT message_content, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players JOIN guilds ON players.player_id = guilds.guild_leader_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE item_quantity > 0;
SELECT guild_name, COUNT(player_id) AS num_players FROM guilds JOIN players ON guilds.guild_id = players.player_id GROUP BY guild_name HAVING num_players > 10;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM rooms WHERE capacity >= 10 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 OR receiver_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT player_name, player_email, registration_date FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2020-01-01' AND player_email LIKE '%gmail%'
SELECT room_name, capacity, created_date FROM rooms WHERE capacity >= 10 ORDER BY created_date ASC
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time, end_time FROM game_sessions WHERE end_time > '2021-06-30' AND player_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT player_id, is_online, last_seen FROM online_status WHERE is_online = TRUE ORDER BY last_seen
